headline: DISCO Pharmaceuticals Enters License Agreement to Advance Novel Cancer Surfaceome Targeted Therapies
summary: Collaboration with Amgen to advance a cancer target discovered using DISCO’s proprietary surfaceome mapping technology Cologne, Germany, January 7, 2026 – DISCO Pharmaceuticals (“DISCO”), today announced an exclusive license agreement with Amgen to advance novel therapeutic candidates addressing a target that was mapped on the surface of a cancer cell by DISCO’s proprietary platform. Under the terms of the agreement, DISCO will be eligible to receive up to $618 million total potential deal value
